Other users will not see this. ) // const isInvalid = password === '' || email === '' const isInvalid = false const CHECKBOX_TERMS = [ { id: 'terms', label: 'I confirm that I have read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.', required: true, isChecked: terms }, { id: 'marketing', label: 'I would like to receive, occasional news and exclusive offers from via email. I can opt out of receiving these at any time in my account settings.', isChecked: marketing } ] return (
{birthday && renderBirthday()}
